title: book_It's_Called_a_Breakup_Because_It's_Broken
text:
ISBN-13: 9780767921961.
ISBN-10: 0767921968.
Title: It's Called a Breakup Because It's Broken.
Subtitle: The Smart Girl's Breakup Buddy.
Authors: Greg Behrendt;Amiira Ruotola-Behrendt.
Categories: Self-Help.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=7TJzvxfoKZkC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A humorous but helpful handbook offers survival strategies for women who are getting over Mr. Wrong and struggling to rebuild their lives, covering everything from ending a relationship permanently to finding a brighter romantic future..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 4.01.
Number of Pages: 276.
Ratings Count: 8388.
